Quick search

convim¶

This module contains functionality to convert miriad files to fits files and back.

Note: it is not clear which pipeline module uses it.

Reference¶

apercal.subs.convim.fitstomir(fitsimage, mirimage)[source]¶

Convert a MIRIAD image to a fits image mirimage (string): The MIRIAD image to convert fitsimage (string): The output FITS image

apercal.subs.convim.mirtofits(mirimage, fitsimage)[source]¶

Convert a MIRIAD image to a fits image mirimage (string): The MIRIAD image to convert fitsimage (string): The output FITS image
